response.overview: Fresh from conquering stages around the world with their successful world tour, the Nation’s Girl Group is coming home for a special year-end celebration with their fans. This marks their second major concert at the Philippine Arena, following the historic, sold-out success of their Grand BINIverse show at the same venue.  More than just a concert, BINIfied is BINI’s way of saying thank you to their BLOOMs for the unwavering love and support. Expect powerful performances, heartwarming moments, and an exciting atmosphere as BINI and BLOOMs unite once again to celebrate how far they’ve come.
response.title: BINIfied!
